entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView shows all items one over the other when the first item have no data #17891
  • CollectionView items height is all over the place when scrolling on iOS (.Net 8 + MAUI workload 8.0.0-rc.1.9171/8.0.100-rc.1) #17890
  • DotNet MAUI with .Net 7 fails to open Websocket in Android Foreground Service #17889
  • Splash Screen Issue on Tablets in both portrait and landscape modes #17887
  • MAUI Android Shadow function is missing internal View.Context.ToPixels() function to get proper scaling (simple proof included) #17886
  • The width of CollectionView's footer and header is not correct #17885
  • Entire words ommitted from Label display in Android with specific shadow/hierarchy settings (no issue in Windows/iOS) #17884
  • Android not allowing AbsoluteLayout/VerticalStackLayout Height and Width to be set properly (working on iOS/Windows) #17883
  • VerticalStackLayout/AbsoluteLayout add a 1 pixel padding even when padding is set to zero (Windows/iOS/Android all affected) #17882
  • Border with Shadow triggering "[View] ContentViewGroup not displayed because it is too large to fit into a software layer (or drawing cache)" in Android #17881

Closed

  • Hot Reload Problem : Read out of bounds #9363
  • CollectionView still has default spacing between items, despite numerous PRs to fix it #17851
  • Android App crash if the itemtemplate of CollectionView have MultiBinding #17711
  • Android App crashes if CollectionView have more than one item #17735
  • Windows app only shows first item in the CollectionView #17736

PullRequests

Created

  • Limit star expansion when measuring/arranging at constrained sizes #17880

Updated

  • Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Make Entitlements in Templates for MacCatalyst more consistent between debug and release configs. #17833
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
